articles.description: Following the culmination of the IND vs NZ series, Dinesh Karthik named one bowler who he believes will be a certain selection in Rohit Sharma's India in the 2022 ICC Men's T20 World Cup in Australia. | Cricket
articles.content: Veteran Indian wicketkeeper-batsman Dinesh Karthik on Sunday picked leg-spinner Yuzvendra Chahal as an absolute certainty for Rohit Sharma-ledIndia's squad for the 2022 T20 World Cup slated to be pla… [+3007 chars]

articles.title: INDvNZ 3rd T20I: Rohit relaxes post drop quibble; Ishan eager; Chahar does a Djokovic - The Indian Express
articles.description: Emotional Rollercoaster: New Zealand flattened 3-0 in three-match T20I series as India win by 73 runs in Kolkata.

articles.title: Aronian Beats Erigaisi In Armageddon To Clinch Tata Steel India Blitz - Chess.com
